cause.description:
HSUS MySpace Page | Stop Puppy Mills Website


In underground puppy mills dogs are kept and bred over and over again until their bodies can no longer take it. They're kept in dirty cages and spend their lives in those cages. By buying dogs from pet stores that sell them or buy supplies at stores that sell puppies you are supporting this terrible thing. Join me by going to the website above and sign a pledge to say you'll do your part. Please I know so many of us have a dog or dogs and how would you feel if they were getting this kind of treatment? HELP THE ONE"S WHO CAN"T HELP THEMSELVES!!! 1. This treatment of puppies must end now 2. Stop buying from pet stores that sell dogs 3. Save these kind, beautiful, funny animals that we love
cause.name: Stop Puppy Mills
